---
execute:
  echo: false
format: 
  html:
    page-layout: custom
editor: visual
---

```{css}
.page-layout-custom {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  height: 100vh;
}

.contributor {
  margin: 0px 2px;
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
}

.contributor:hover {
  transform: translateY(-6px);
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
}

.package_repo_url {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.package_repo_url:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
```
